entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A 20 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 60
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 30
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
